works.description:
In addition to common law rights developed over almost three decades of  
continuous use, Tozai owns three federal registrations for the LODE RUNNER
 
mark (1,307,253 / 3,700,329 & 4,026,378), each of which is in effect,
valid  
and fully enforceable. Mladen Mitev are distributing a game, "LODEDROID  
RUNNER" on Google Play, which is infringing Tozai's trademark rights.

Second, Mladen Mitev's apps infringe Tozai's copyrights. Tozai owns all  
copyrights related to the LODE RUNNER games, including but not limited to 

the version of the LODE RUNNER game playable on NES.  Mladen Mitev's app  

copies the levels, characters, enemy, gold placement, music and other  
features from that original LODE RUNNER game.  The infringing game can be 

located at
